title: Delegation Decision-Making Competency Workshop for Nursing Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Role-play-based program allowing practicing nurses to safely practice delegation decision-making encountered in real work environments.

learning_goals: Learners can classify three types of nursing tasks by applying the five delegation criteria (5 Rights of Delegation).
Learners can identify high-risk/low-risk delegation scenarios through role-playing and develop appropriate response strategies.
Learners can verbally explain decision-making processes in team-based scenarios and incorporate peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
